listFitness

public static org.json.JSONObject listFitness()
                                       throws ServerConnectionException,
                                              ServerBadRetrievalException,
                                              org.json.JSONException
This is the request you would use to retrieve the complete fitness table.

Returns:
The fitness table, encoded into a JSONObject
Throws:
ServerConnectionException - If an error occurs during communication with the server
ServerBadRetrievalException - If a server-side error occurs during the transaction
org.json.JSONException - Upon receipt of A JSONObject with unexpected format

login

public static void login(java.lang.String userName,
                         java.lang.String password)
                  throws ServerConnectionException,
                         ServerBadLoginException,
                         org.json.JSONException
Logs a user into the server. This is required before performing most other server tasks

Parameters:
userName -
password -
Throws:
ServerConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the server
ServerBadLoginException - If the provided user name is invalid
org.json.JSONException - If the JSON object returned by the server was of an un expected format

register

public static void register(java.lang.String userName,
                            java.lang.String password1,
                            java.lang.String password2,
                            java.lang.String email1,
                            java.lang.String email2,
                            ServerConstants.Gender gender,
                            ServerConstants.MeasurementSystem mesUnit,
                            int weight,
                            java.lang.String height,
                            java.util.Date birthday)
                     throws ServerConnectionException,
                            org.json.JSONException,
                            ServerInvalidPasswordException,
                            ServerInvalidUserException,
                            ServerInvalidEmailException,
                            ServerInvalidWeightException,
                            ServerInvalidHeightException,
                            ServerInvalidDateException
Registers a new user

Parameters:
userName - the desired user name
password1 - the desired password
password2 - the desired password again, for confirmation
email1 - the user's email address
email2 - the user's email address again for confirmation
gender - the user's gender
mesUnit - the user's preferred measurement system
weight - the user's weight, in units indicated by mesUnit
height - the user's height, formatted as appropriate for mesUnit
birthday - the user's date of birth
Throws:
ServerConnectionException
org.json.JSONException
ServerInvalidPasswordException
ServerInvalidUserException
ServerInvalidEmailException
ServerInvalidGenderException
ServerInvalidDateException
ServerInvalidUnitException
ServerInvalidWeightException
ServerInvalidHeightException
